title: Analyze a Sale-Leaseback Opportunity
description: An investment agent is analyzing a deal where a company wants to sell its corporate headquarters and lease it back from the new owner.

tasks.description: Analyze the selling company's financial health to assess their creditworthiness as a long-term tenant.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the level of risk associated with the tenant.

tasks.description: Review the proposed lease terms (rent, term, escalations) to determine if they are at, above, or below market rates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the attractiveness of the proposed lease.

tasks.description: Prepare an investment analysis for a potential buyer, highlighting the cap rate, tenant credit, and long-term security of the investment.
tasks.expected_outcome: A comprehensive investment summary is created.
